faq.question: What are the system requirements for SynthMaster / SynthMaster Player?
faq.answer: CPU: 2.0 Ghz, Intel SSE3 instruction set. RAM: 2 GB. OS: Windows 7 and above, or macOS 10.9 and above. For AAX format, you need ProTools 11 and above.

faq.question: Do I have to create a PayPal account to make a purchase?
faq.answer: No, you can purchase without opening up a PayPal account.

faq.question: On how many computers am I allowed to install SynthMaster?
faq.answer: You are allowed to install SynthMaster and its player versions on up to 5 machines at a time.

faq.question: My DAW (Logic/GarageBand) is not detecting the AudioUnit plug-in on macOS. What should I do?
faq.answer: Ensure your DAW is not running during installation. After installation, you may need to clear the AudioUnits cache. In Finder, go to 'Go to Folder' and navigate to '~/Library/Caches'. Delete any folder named 'AudioUnitCache' and any file named 'com.apple.audiounits.cache', then reboot your system.

faq.question: Can I use SynthMaster One expansions with SynthMaster/SynthMaster Player?
faq.answer: Not directly. SynthMaster One is a different product. However, SynthMaster 3 is able to load SynthMaster One presets as layers.

faq.question: Can I get a refund if the product doesn't work on my system?
faq.answer: Please contact us first to resolve the issue. As per our license agreement, if we cannot resolve the issue in 7 business days, we will refund your purchase amount.

faq.question: Can I transfer my license to somebody else?
faq.answer: Yes, you can transfer your license. When you find a buyer, contact us. The transfer fee is $15.
